Replace.Text: [Mod] 现在曼沙穆萨可以使用信仰购买建筑、军事单位、平民单位和间谍。沙漠丘陵也可以为外商提供+1[ICON_Gold]金币，沙漠平原改为为外商提供+2[ICON_Gold]金币。在每个回合开始时，国库的[ICON_Gold]金币增加3%

[Mod] Mansa Musa can now purchase buildings, Civilian units, Military units and Spy with Faith. Desert Hills tile also provide +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for foreign traders, flat Desert tile now provide +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for foreign traders. At the beginning of each turn, the Treasury gains +3% [ICON_Gold] Gold.
